Description.Text: The HOTEL FINE GARDEN TOYONAKA is a hotel. Located in Osaka area..

A 2-minute drive from Itami Airport, Hotel Fine Garden Toyonaka is located in Toyonaka, the northern area of Osaka. Hotel Fine Garden Toyonaka features free parking, a 24-hour front desk and rooms with a flat-screen TV. Free Wi-Fi is available at the entire property. Hotel Fine Garden Toyonaka is a 15-minute drive from Hotarugaike Train Station, Satsukiyama Park and Kureha Shrine. It is a 25-minute drive from Mefu Shrine and a 30-minute drive from Osaka Castle.
